New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play together in any NBA game.
Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James played together for around four minutes during the second quarter.
The Lakers were narrowly defeated by the Suns with a final score of 114-118.
LeBron James set a screen for Bronny James to take a 3-point shot, which he missed.
Pre-Game Insights: Lakers coach JJ Redick informed Bronny about his appearance playing with his father ahead of the game.
LeBron James expressed his long-held wish to play with his son, stating in May 2023 that his goal was to be on the court with Bronny.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James described playing with his son as a moment he will never forget and expressed that it was pretty cool for both of them and their family.
LeBron James shared his joy of being able to work with his son and influence him, calling it one of the greatest things a father could hope for.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game took place on Bronny's 20th birthday.
LeBron James' record-tying 22nd season in the NBA was marked by this game.
